title: Jug, ca. 1815–18
provenance: Mr. Dudley Westropp, Dublin; Louis Wine, Ltd., Dublin; 1959 WPW
description: Barrel-shaped body tapering at neck, shaped lip with pouring spout, loop handle; cut around center with band of large printies enclosing faceted diamonds, around neck with hollow faceting, around base with short verticalfluting; ground pontil mark bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jug, ca. 1815–18.
ca. 1815–18. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-128.
